meta.name: description
meta.content: Devpost powers hackathons and app contests around the world. Sign up to make new friends, explore new APIs / tech, and win prizes & recognition.
Devpost powers hackathons and app contests around the world. Sign up to make new friends, explore new APIs / tech, and win prizes & recognition.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Devpost powers hackathons and app contests around the world. Sign up to make new friends, explore new APIs / tech, and win prizes & recognition.
Devpost powers hackathons and app contests around the world. Sign up to make new friends, explore new APIs / tech, and win prizes & recognition.

div.h1: Join the world's best online and in-person hackathons

meta.name: description
meta.content: IBM Careers. Job seeker information about IBM, how we work, Global careers and employment

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: IBM, IBMers, jobs, careers, carreers, carrer, carrers, career, carreer, employment employement, employemnt, emolyment, job opportunity/opportunities, entry-level, experienced professional, seekers, job seekers, students, university, college, value, purpose, innovation, IBMjobs blog, IBM Jobs Global, cognitive, Watson, explore jobs, new collar, skills, talent, programs, programme, partner, partnership, work, diverse, diversity, inclusive, inclusivity, inclusion, benefits, corporate citizen, future, STEM, Lime, GEM, engineers, MBAs, transform, transformation, P-Tech, veteran/s, veteran 2K, hiring initiative, potential, science
IBM Careers. Job seeker information about IBM, how we work, Global careers and employment

head.title: IBM Global Careers

a.aria-label: United states selected - Choose a country

input.placeholder: What job are you looking for today?
input.style: border-top-style: hidden; border-right-style: hidden; border-left-style: hidden; border-bottom-style: groove; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)

div.class: ibm-grid-col-max-16-5 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-5 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-5 ibm-hidden-medium ibm-hidden-small ibm-nospacing

div.p: Join our Talent Network
Tell us more about yourself and we'll keep you up-to-date regarding upcoming events and career opportunities that match your interests.

a.class: msc-youtube-white ibm-grid-col-max-16-8 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-8 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-8 ibm-grid-col-md-8-8 ibm-grid-col-sm-4-4 same

div.class: ibm-grid-col-max-16-8 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-8 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-8 ibm-grid-col-md-8-8 ibm-grid-col-sm-4-4 same
div.p: IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.

Our Client Engineering team way of working is human-centric, with a critical focus on co-creation, co-execution, and co-operation; it’s like working in a start-up, delivering at speed but with the scale of the enterprise.
Check open jobs.

a.class: ibm-card ibm-blocklink ibm-no-border ibm-background-cool-gray-10 ibm-highlight-bg-gray-30 ibm-mb-4

div.p: Help change the world
See how our work is truly life changing—from helping to cure diseases, predict weather, to cleaning oceans and beyond.

a.class: ibm-card ibm-blocklink ibm-no-border ibm-background-cool-gray-10 ibm-highlight-bg-gray-30 ibm-mb-4

img.alt: IBMer in shirt with rainbow logo of IBM

div.p: Thrive in an inclusive enviroment
Joining IBM is about joining a culture of openness, collaboration, trust, and the invitation and expectation to have a voice.

a.class: ibm-card ibm-blocklink ibm-no-border ibm-background-cool-gray-10 ibm-highlight-bg-gray-30 ibm-mb-4

div.p: Learn and grow your career
Careers are made from experiences. At IBM, those experiences can be diverse, unlimited and far-reaching.

section.class: ibm-band carousel-round corousel-small-margin-16 carousel-partial ibm-pt-8 ibm-pb-0 ibm-background-white-core ibm-hidden-medium ibm-hidden-large ibm-hidden-xlarge ibm-hidden-max

a.class: ibm-card ibm-blocklink ibm-no-border ibm-background-cool-gray-10 ibm-highlight-bg-gray-30 ibm-mb-4

div.p: Help change the world
See how our work is truly life changing—from helping to cure diseases, predict weather, to cleaning oceans and beyond.

img.alt: IBMer in shirt with rainbow logo of IBM

div.p: Thrive in an inclusive enviroment
Joining IBM is about joining a culture of openness, collaboration, trust, and the invitation and expectation to have a voice.

a.class: ibm-card ibm-blocklink ibm-no-border ibm-background-cool-gray-10 ibm-highlight-bg-gray-30 ibm-mb-4

div.p: Learn and grow your career
Careers are made from experiences. At IBM, those experiences can be diverse, unlimited and far-reaching.

div.class: ibm-grid-col-max-16-4 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-md-8-4 ibm-grid-col-sm-4-4 ibm-mb-6

div.style: position: absolute; bottom: -15px; transform: translateX(-10px); height: 50px !important

div.class: ibm-grid-col-max-16-4 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-md-8-4 ibm-grid-col-sm-4-4 ibm-mb-6

div.style: display: inline-block; width: 100%; position: absolute; bottom: -23px; left: 0

div.class: ibm-grid-col-max-16-4 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-md-8-4 ibm-grid-col-sm-4-4 ibm-mb-6

div.style: position: absolute; bottom: -15px; transform: translateX(-10px); height: 50px !important

div.class: ibm-grid-col-max-16-4 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-md-8-4 ibm-grid-col-sm-4-4 ibm-mb-6

div.style: position: absolute; bottom: -15px; transform: translateX(-10px); height: 50px !important

div.class: ibm-grid-col-max-16-4 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-4 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-6 ibm-grid-col-md-8-8 ibm-grid-col-sm-4-4 ibm-nospacing

p.span: Don’t give up on your career. Own the journey you have taken. Opportunities and pathways are changing.

p.a: Returning to work after a long career break can be daunting but this IBMer shows it can happen 

p.span: IBM is at the forefront of world-changing innovations such as AI and Blockchain. As an IBMer I can help shape the future of this technology for the good of the people and the world.

p.a: Gaming for good: meet the women behind the movement at IBM 

p.span: Being out at IBM has unlocked so many doors for me and I have been able to network with other LGBT+ colleagues all over the world. Not only am I able to be myself but IBM is helping me to be my best self!

p.a: Coming out at work and my advice for LGBT+ job seekers 

p.span: As a Master Inventor, I enjoy being able to re-imagine fundamentals of business and drive change using technology.

p.a: How this IBM Master Inventor brings STEM education to Native American communities 

div.class: ibm-hidden-medium ibm-hidden-large ibm-hidden-xlarge ibm-hidden-max carousel-round corousel-small-margin-32

div.class: ibm-grid-col-max-16-0 ibm-grid-col-xlg-16-0 ibm-grid-col-lg-16-0 ibm-grid-col-md-8-0 ibm-grid-col-sm-4-4 same-small

p.span: As a Master Inventor, I enjoy being able to re-imagine fundamentals of business and drive change using technology.

p.a: How this IBM Master Inventor brings STEM education to Native American communities 

div.p: We’re looking for women from all backgrounds to join us in our mission to grow our female community. Take a look at what it's like to be a woman at IBM and access resources that will help you take the next step in your career.
Apply
Screening
Online assessments
Assessment center / interview

img.alt: Pictogram of person with three circles over head

div.p: Decision / Offer

Deciding to start your career at IBM is an investment in your future. Whether you’re an undergraduate, graduate, or post-graduate, we’ll help you turn your years of study into tangible achievements through a vast array of global career opportunities and development programs.
At IBM, you will find a wealth of opportunities to create the career you’ve always imagined. Find out what it’s like to be an early professional at IBM. Search entry level jobs .
We are loading your job opportunities...
Connect with us

meta.name: description
meta.content: Saiba por que mentes imaginativas se encontram aqui.
Carreiras na Apple: Junte-se a nós. Seja você.
Saiba por que mentes imaginativas se encontram aqui.

aside.data-strings: { 'exit': 'Sair', 'view': '{%STOREFRONT%} Página inicial da loja', 'segments': { 'smb': 'Página inicial da Apple Store Corporativa', 'eduInd': 'Página inicial da Apple Store Educacional', 'other': 'Página inicial da Apple Store' } }

div.p: Aqui é o lugar onde mentes imaginativas se encontram e o compromisso com valores leva à realização de um grande trabalho. Aqui, mais do que participar, você vai contribuir.

span.aria-label: Junte-se à Apple e inspire o trabalho dos nossos times.
span.span: e inspire o trabalho dos nossos times.

div.p: Onde você pode fazer a diferença? Confira as áreas em que atuamos, onde ficam nossas instalações ao redor do mundo e as oportunidades para estudantes.

div.p: A tecnologia é mais poderosa quando todo mundo participa do seu desenvolvimento.

div.a: Saiba mais sobre acessibilidade na Apple

div.p: Nosso objetivo é deixar o mundo melhor do que encontramos.

div.a: Saiba mais sobre as iniciativas ambientais da Apple

div.p: Os produtos da Apple protegem sua privacidade e garantem a você o controle das suas próprias informações.

div.a: Saiba mais sobre privacidade na Apple

div.p: Para a gente, segurança, respeito e apoio são essenciais em qualquer ambiente de trabalho.

div.a: Saiba mais sobre a responsabilidade dos fornecedores na Apple

section.p: A Apple oferece oportunidades iguais de emprego e está comprometida com a inclusão e a diversidade. Também adotamos ações afirmativas para oferecer oportunidades de emprego e de promoção para todos os candidatos, com o compromisso de cooperar e fazer as adaptações necessárias para acomodar deficiências físicas e mentais. Além disso, não permitimos o consumo de drogas no ambiente de trabalho.

div.p: Outras formas de comprar: encontre uma Apple Store ou revendedor Apple na sua região. Ou ligue para 0800-761-0867. Rua Leopoldo Couto de Magalhães Jr., 700, 7º andar, Itaim Bibi. São Paulo, SP. CEP: 04542-000.
Os Serviços de Mídia da Apple são fornecidos pela Apple Services LATAM LLC.

meta.name: description
meta.content: We're a company of pioneers. It's our job to make bold bets, and we get our energy from inventing on behalf of customers. Success is measured against the possible, not the probable. For today’s pioneers, that’s exactly why there’s no place on Earth they’d rather build than Amazon.

head.title: Amazon.jobs: Help us build Earth’s most customer-centric company.

div.data-react-props:
{"description":"

Shreya is a Research Scientist in the Prime Machine Learning Team, part of the Worldwide Marketing org. She has a PhD in Electrical and Computer Engineering and loves to use her Machine Learning (ML) background to dive deep into customer data and gather insights and recommendations for her business stakeholders. She joined Amazon in April 2017, shortly after finishing her post-doc in Biomedical Informatics from Columbia University.

Shreya is responsible for building Machine Learning (ML) models  that help her business stakeholders create personalized products and messages for their customers. She has helped launch and personalize several programs and products such as Prime subscription plan offers and Back to School/Off to College Campaigns. Recently, she has helped develop a solution to scale ML models globally and launch personalization faster in new markets. Shreya’s favorite part about working at Amazon is the ability to use data to come up with recommendations that speak to customers. Amazon’s customer-obsessed culture has made this job an ideal fit for her.

One of the things that Shreya loves at Amazon is the opportunity to grow and learn new skills while working with some of the smartest people in the industry. During her tenure, she has picked up several programming languages, learned and applied new scientific methods, co-authored several internal publications and one external publiction, and co-authored a patent. This experience has given her the best of both worlds – fast-paced industry work along with academic learning and growth.

Outside of work, Shreya loves to travel, hike, explore the mountains and lakes around Seattle, and try out new cafes and restaurants in the area. She also enjoys cooking, reading, sketching, and indoor gardening on gloomier days.

","image":"https://static.amazon.jobs/employee_profiles/1007/images/Shreya.jpg?1600990106","jobTitle":"Research Scientist","name":"Shreya"}

div.h1: Come build the future with us

div.p: Our mission is to be Earth's most customer-centric company. This is what unites Amazonians across teams and geographies as we are all striving to delight our customers and make their lives easier, one innovative product, service, and idea at a time.

div.a: Saiba mais sobre como trabalhar na Amazon

meta.name: Description
meta.content: Imagine being part of an innovative global environment where you can enhance your expertise, develop your knowledge, and take your career as far as you want.

meta.name: Keywords
meta.content: Overview, Careers, jobs, What is it like to work at Oracle, Oracle Jobs, Oracle Careers, Working at Oracle, Diversity and Inclusion , Veterans, Recruit Military , Veteran Internship Program, Internships, Job Search, Oracle Job Search, College recruiting , Corporate Citizenship

meta.name: Updated Date

meta.content: Imagine being part of an innovative global environment where you can enhance your expertise, develop your knowledge, and take your career as far as you want.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Imagine being part of an innovative global environment where you can enhance your expertise, develop your knowledge, and take your career as far as you want.

meta.name: altpages

li.a: Click to view our Accessibility Policy

div.div: We’re sorry. We could not find a match for your search.
div.p: We suggest you try the following to help find what you’re looking for:

ul.li: Check the spelling of your keyword search.
Use synonyms for the keyword you typed, for example, try "application" instead of "software."

div.data-alerttxt: suggestions found to navigate use up and down arrows

div.p: Want to make a difference? You’ve come to the right place. We’re using the technologies of tomorrow to tackle the real-world problems of today.

span.a: Alliance of Black Leaders for Excellence

div.h3: Change lives doing what you love
div.p: From advancing energy efficiency to reimagining online commerce, the work we do is not only transforming the world of business—it's protecting governments, powering non-profits, and giving billions of people the tools they need to outpace change. What future will you create?

header.h3: A place where everyone can grow

div.p: Are you a student or recent graduate? We have a variety of programs that can help you build your skills and launch your career.

div.h3: Be proud of who you are

div.p: Innovation starts with inclusion here. Everyone’s voice is heard and valued.
Your development is our priority. Take your career to the next level with world-class learning opportunities.
Our benefits are designed to help you lead a balanced life. Be at your best thanks to time off, strong support, and great resources.
Join a fun and flexible workplace where you’ll be inspired to do your best work. Here’s what we have to say about life at Oracle.
Join our team of fearless engineers and help us build a new class of cloud.
We’re changing the way the world does business by delivering the #1 cloud business solution—and we can help you transform your career.
We collaborate with companies to lead them through change. Add your perspective to our team!
We partner with the US Intelligence Community. Join our team and contribute to the world’s most advanced national security missions.

div.h3: Class Of: Corliss’ sales career comes full circle
div.p: Class Of helps graduates like Corliss find their place in the professional world. Hear about her journey from student to sales manager.

div.h3: My journey to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure: A Q&A
div.p: Calvin explains how he got into cloud engineering and shares advice for current college students beginning their job search.

div.h3: Running towards success: Join Oracle Consulting
div.p: Saq opens up about his passion for running and how it compliments his work ethic. Have you got what it takes to join his team?
What are you waiting for? Start your future at Oracle today.
Stay up to date with the latest from Careers at Oracle.

ppc-content.span:
COVID-19 notice: Microsoft continues to prioritize the health and safety of our candidates, employees and their families in response to the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19). Most of our interviews are currently conducted virtually, learn more on how to prepare for your virtual interview.
Microsoft may have a COVID-19 workplace vaccination requirement, depending on location, and may require proof of vaccination, attestation of a previous COVID infection or an approved accommodation for employees to work onsite. In the U.S., to enter Microsoft buildings we require employees to upload proof of vaccination or to attest to having had a previous COVID-19 infection. We also have an accommodation process for employees with medical conditions (or other protected reasons such as religion) for individuals who have not had a previous COVID-19 infection or who cannot be vaccinated.

span.ppc-content: We offer a variety of scholarship programs, internships and full-time opportunities designed to empower you. Imagine the impact you can have and jumpstart your career.

a.aria-label: Explore student opportunities

span.ppc-content: Want to make a difference? So do we. Step in to explore the wealth of career opportunities and take your career to the next level.

a.aria-label: Explore career opportunities

div.div:
<div class="ph-slider-outer-container ph-slide-loader" ph-card-slider-v1="" data-widget-attr="ph-card-slider-v1" pha-phslide-dots="true" pha-phslide-use-transform="false" pha-phslide-autoplay="false" pha-phslide-accessibility="true" pha-phslide-fade="true" pha-phslide-arrows="true" pha-phslide-draggable="false" pha-phslide-swipe="false" data-cards-per-row="one" pha-phslide-append-dots=".slick-dots-area" pha-phslide-custom-paging="" data-ph-id="ph-1556688293325-employees-testimonial-cc-slider-view3-option1-ph-html-v1sWVgSI-x8TwOU" au-target-id="330" pha-phslide-dot-nav-arrows="true">
"At Microsoft, you’ll be empowered to work on things that you’re passionate about. You’ll be given autonomy. Your ideas will matter."
— Lauren,
Senior Software Engineer
"The freedom to create really powerful and engaging solutions is the thing that I really like. And I know what we are creating, millions of people are using."
— Nitish
, UX Designer
"I want to transform how people experience 'Halo' in their living rooms and on their PCs. We will never do anything that doesn't move the universe forward."
— Kiki
, Studio Head
"Technology provides that avenue to compensate in areas where something might be more difficult. It's really cool to be able to help to enable people."
— Chris
, Senior Software Engineer
"The world has a lot to offer, and it's not about how much you take and grow; it's about how much you give back."
— Vidya
, Program Manager
slide 1 of 5 "At Microsoft, you’ll be empowered to work on things that you’re passionate about. You’ll be given autonomy. Your ideas will matter." — Lauren, Senior Software Engineer

<div ph-card-slider-v1="" data-widget-attr="ph-card-slider-v1" class="ph-slide-loader" role="region" pha-phslide-dots="true" pha-phslide-use-transform="false" pha-phslide-fade="true" pha-phslide-adaptive-height="true" pha-phslide-autoplay="false" pha-phslide-arrows="true" pha-phslide-accessibility="true" pha-phslide-draggable="false" data-cards-per-row="one" pha-phslide-append-dots=".slick-dots-area" pha-phslide-append-arrows=".slick-custom-nav-area" pha-phslide-aria-text="Carousel, You're currently viewing slide " pha-phslide-custom-paging="" pha-phslide-prev-arrow="Previous" pha-phslide-next-arrow="Next" data-ph-id="ph-1556688465473-employees-testimonial-cc-slider-view2-option1-ph-html-v1HWryG2-WCzqP2" au-target-id="336" aria-label="Carousel, You're currently viewing slide 3 of 3" pha-phslide-dot-nav-arrows="true" phslide-dot-info-selector="[component-content-key='heading']">
Artificial Intelligence
Computers are actively learning about the world around them. AI is no longer the stuff of science fiction. It’s happening now. At Microsoft, we’re infusing artificial intelligence across everything we make in an effort to democratize AI and help solve society’s greatest challenges.
“People are at the heart of the machine learning life cycle. Building machine learning systems that are reliable, trustworthy, and fair requires relevant stakeholders to have at least a basic understanding of how they work.”
— Jennifer,
Senior Principal Researcher, Microsoft Research
Cloud
We’re as dedicated to our customer’s success as we are in innovating for the future. Microsoft’s investment in the cloud is making people’s lives easier all over the world.
"The cloud is the future of how we use devices; the potential is infinite."
— Julie,
Azure Program Manager
Diversity and Inclusion
We bring together people from all over the world, and our efforts start at home.
Learn more about Diversity and Inclusion at Microsoft
"Microsoft is welcoming to everyone."
— Sophia,
Senior Software Engineer

slide 3 of 3 Diversity and Inclusion We bring together people from all over the world, and our efforts start at home. Learn more about Diversity and Inclusion at Microsoft "Microsoft is welcoming to everyone." — Sophia, Senior Software Engineer

h2.ppc-content: Inclusive Hiring for people with disabilities

span.ppc-content:
At Microsoft, we know that having a diverse workforce which includes people with disabilities is essential if we are going to deliver on our mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our Neurodiversity Hiring Program, Ability Hiring events, and inclusive interviews enable all candidates to showcase their skills and bring their best selves.
Explore our Inclusive Hiring programs

img.alt: Photo of Microsoft employee Anne at a computer

span.ppc-content: Explore the stories behind our diverse workforce.

a.aria-label: Read all stories on Microsoft Life opens in a new tab
a.ppc-content: Read all stories on Microsoft Life

a.title: Neurodiversity in the workplace: How Cecilia Fang is smashing the stigma
a.aria-label: The great giving machine: driven to make an impact, employees turn giving into a way of life opens in a new tab

h4.ppc-content: Neurodiversity in the workplace: How Cecilia Fang is smashing the stigma

span.ppc-content: After being diagnosed with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), this Microsoft ANZ employee was determined to keep bringing her whole self to work.

a.aria-label: The great giving machine: driven to make an impact, employees turn giving into a way of life opens in a new tab

img.alt: Members of Microsoft's employee giving team

h4.ppc-content: The great giving machine: driven to make an impact, employees turn giving into a way of life

span.ppc-content: Run like a business, Microsoft's employee giving program has redefined how people can harmonize their careers and their instincts to do good.

a.aria-label: At the largest private hackathon on the planet, Microsoft employees fire up ideas by the thousands opens in a new tab

img.alt: Picture of Microsoft employees at Hackathon

h4.ppc-content: At the largest private hackathon on the planet, Microsoft employees fire up ideas by the thousands

span.ppc-content: Last year, more than 18,000 people across 400 cities and 75 countries came together to bring world-changing new ideas to life at Microsoft's annual Hackathon, now celebrating its fifth, and busiest, year.

a.aria-label: Family matters: for three siblings, a teasing rivalry gave way to camaraderie at the same company opens in a new tab

h4.ppc-content: Family matters: for three siblings, a teasing rivalry gave way to camaraderie at the same company

span.ppc-content: Because of his own self-evolution while working at Microsoft, an older brother wanted his brother and sister to have the same options to grow.
